patterns: can you tell me your name
responses: We are IEEE HKN Eta Kappa Mu Alpha Chapter
World's largest technical professional organization, with many citing IEEE publications as well as attending IEEE organized professional and educational activities

patterns: what I can get from joining this club
responses: Join discussions on various technical topics, Access to IEEE.tv for new technological developments, Network with any field's professionals, Discover IEEE events locally and internationally
A non-technical 'Society' within IEEE for Student Members to network with one another
The honor society of IEEE. Honor societies recognize academic or leadership excellence among members (who are mostly students)

patterns: what is eta kappa nu mu alpha chapter
responses: Each HKN Chapter is tied to a university. For UCSI's HKN Chapter, we are known as 'Mu Alpha'
IoT talk, Stem Workshop, Data Science with pandas workshop, and many more
